Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.firstPage:
MIa Femtech is a dynamic, user-centered platform designed with a focus on seamless UI/UX and enhanced functionality. Built primarily with Nuxt for its frontend framework, Express.js for backend logic, and Tailwind CSS for responsive design, MIa Femtech offers a polished and intuitive interface.

The project involved translating intricate Figma designs into a live, responsive UI, creating a visually appealing and accessible experience for users. Key tasks included implementing multilingual support, backend logic for efficient data handling, and rigorous attention to design detail. The result is a platform that blends sophisticated tech with user-friendly navigation and design, tailored to MIa Femtech’s specific goals.
Projects.secondPage:
GamifyMex is an engaging gambling platform built with Astro and React for the frontend, Tailwind CSS and Sass for styling, and Django on the backend. It features a dashboard where users can register and participate in various games.

GamifyMex offers pages dedicated to bingo and quiz games, providing a captivating user experience with top-notch UI/UX. The design incorporates Three.js to enhance visual appeal, making GamifyMex a standout in interactive and immersive gameplay.
Projects.thirdPage:
The Velzia app is a  website developed for a Spanish company specializing in real estate investment company. Built using React with TypeScript on the frontend and powered by a Node.js, Express on the backend.

The site provides an intuitive and accessible interface, tailored to showcase the company’s services, expertise, and projects to a diverse audience.
